snippet: SAFER--Morley. The Trustees and Staff of the New York Hall of Science (NYSCI) extend their deepest sympathies to the family and friends of Morley Safer, CBS News Correspondent and husband of former NYSCI Trustee Jane Safer. He gave selflessly of his time and was a great friend to NYSCI. His loss will be felt by all of us. 1/3
